question.para: When loading data, which files must exist in the chip data path in order to successfully load data?

answer.para: You must have the "txt" file. The "rpt" file is recommended as it is used to error check against the layout of the chip type specified for the hybridization.

Other files are not mandatory. Some provide quality control data. All other files, if loaded, will be made available to users for download. Additionally, if the user publishes their data these files will be made available to the public.
